● YES! I've created a comprehensive Security Hardening Plan at /workspace/PROJECTS/t2/docs/SECURITY-HARDENING-PLAN.md.

  🎯 Plan Overview:

  3-Phase Approach (40-60 hours total)

  Phase 1: Critical Security (Week 1) - 11-16 hours
  1. ✅ Migrate JWT secrets to Google Secret Manager
  2. ✅ Implement NetworkPolicies (zero-trust networking)
  3. ✅ Harden firewall rules (restrict SSH to known IPs)
  4. ✅ Enforce Pod Security Standards (no root containers)
  5. ✅ Reserve static IPs for LoadBalancers

  Phase 2: Enhanced Security (Week 2-3) - 18-30 hours
  1. ✅ Enable container image vulnerability scanning
  2. ✅ Implement Binary Authorization (only signed images)
  3. ✅ Migrate to private GKE cluster
  4. ✅ Automate secrets rotation (90-day policy)
  5. ✅ Deploy bastion host for emergency access

  Phase 3: Compliance & Monitoring (Week 4+) - 18-24 hours
  1. ✅ Deploy Cloud Armor WAF (DDoS, OWASP Top 10)
  2. ✅ Enable Security Command Center monitoring
  3. ✅ Configure Intrusion Detection System
  4. ✅ Implement backup & disaster recovery
  5. ✅ Set up blue-green deployments

  🔴 Current Gaps Identified:

  | Risk   | Issue                             | Impact                          |
  |--------|-----------------------------------|---------------------------------|
  | HIGH   | JWT secret in K8s Secret (base64) | Exposed if cluster compromised  |
  | HIGH   | No NetworkPolicies                | Unrestricted pod-to-pod traffic |
  | HIGH   | No secrets rotation               | Stale credentials               |
  | MEDIUM | Ephemeral LoadBalancer IPs        | Service disruption on recreate  |
  | MEDIUM | Public SSH access                 | Brute-force risk                |
  | MEDIUM | No image scanning                 | Vulnerable dependencies         |

  📋 Includes:

  - ✅ Step-by-step implementation for each hardening measure
  - ✅ Terraform examples for IaC integration
  - ✅ Validation commands to verify each step
  - ✅ Rollback procedures for each change
  - ✅ Cost estimates (~$50-550/month depending on features)
  - ✅ Compliance metrics (CIS, OWASP, SOC2, GDPR)
  - ✅ Complete YAML manifests for NetworkPolicies, Pod Security
  - ✅ Timeline estimates for each task

  Target Security Posture: 🟢 Production-Ready (SOC2 Type II compliant)

    - Future: INCIDENT-RESPONSE.md
